extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Virus Definitions Date for Sophos. This attribute template applies to Sophos (v 7.1).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on Sophos (v 7.1). #Check to see if Sophos is installed if [ -f "/usr/bin/sweep" ]; then result=`/bin/date -j -f "%b %d %Y" "$(/usr/bin/sweep -v | grep "Released" | awk '{print $4, $3, $5}')" "+%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00"` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
